QuestData.Title: Settle the Score
QuestData.Description: A year ago I lost my daughter to the largest boar in the forest.$b$bI have tracked him since, trading blows back and forth. But this time...$b$bLet's just say I don't have much time left.$b$bAll I wish for is vengeance. Please $c, avenge us so that my soul can leave this plane and join my daughter, wherever she may be.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: That beast will pay for taking my daughter's life.
QuestData.CompletionText: Though my lifeblood drains, all I yearn for is vengeance.
QuestData.RewardText: <Caleb's body is lifeless, still warm. His wounds claimed him while you were gone.$b$bHis face seems content, as though he knew you would finish the job.>
